text: What is the main purpose of HTML?

choices: To check the data type of a variable

text: What does the acronym API stand for?
In object-oriented programming, what is encapsulation?
choices: A process of making objects interact with each other
A way to bundle data and methods that work on the data
A method to hide data from other objects
correctChoice: A way to bundle data and methods that work on the data
